entry.title: Use of free authentication apps for 2FA will remain free and are much more secure than SMS
entry.summary:
Use of free authentication apps for 2FA will remain free and are much more secure than SMS
Twitter Support:â€‚Effective March 20, 2023, only Twitter Blue subscribers will be able to use text messages as their two-factor authentication method. Other accounts can use an authentication app or security key for 2FA. Learn more here: â€‚https://blog.twitter.com/en_us/topics/product/2023/an-update-on-two-factor-authentication-using-sms-on-twitter

entry.title: Re @KanekoaTheGreat Free speech is the bedrock of democracy. It is a fundamental defense against autocracy & statism, which is why we must fight so ha...
entry.summary: Re @KanekoaTheGreat Free speech is the bedrock of democracy. It is a fundamental defense against autocracy & statism, which is why we must fight so hard to preserve it. The founders showed great wisdom, based on painful historical lessons, in passing the First Amendment.
